Sleeveless dress in glittery, patterned tulle with a round neckline, opening with a button at the back of the neck and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Lined.

Calf-length dress in a patterned, gently crêped weave with a V-neck and a gathered seam below the bust with narrow trims. Elasticated seam at the back, gathered seams at the shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Slit at the front. Unlined.

Oversized denim jacket with a collar, sleeves and lower section in pile. Buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and discreet pockets in the side seams. Long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and adjustable tabs and buttons at the sides. Lined.
Blouse in soft, washed Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, buttons down the front and long, wide puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Dress in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, a visible elastic waistband and a gathered, flared skirt.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with a deep neckline at the front and long sleeves.

Boots in imitation leather with welt seams around the soles, lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Soft, non-wired bra top in microfibre with folded, glued edges for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimum visibility under the clothes. Wide shoulder straps, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support and a double-layered hem. No fasteners.

Cardigan in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Zip down the front with a chin guard, kangaroo pockets with an overlocked frill trim, long sleeves with a small puff at the shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft jersey. Straight-cut top with a print motif on the front and flutter sleeves. Wide shorts with covered elastication at the waist and inset flounces at the sides of the legs.
Short, A-line dress in soft, slub cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with a flounced trim, and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem.

Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Shirt jacket in airy cotton poplin with a collar, concealed zip down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a pleat and concealed press-studs, welt side pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Jacquard-knit trousers with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and a fake fly. Welt side pockets, a zipped, jetted back pocket and straight legs with contrasting colour piping down the sides and creases.

Shirt jacket in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Two chest pockets, one open and one with a flap and button, and two patch front pockets, one with a small fabric appliqué. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and slits in the sides. Unlined.

Sleeveless dress in airy, patterned chiffon with spaghetti shoulder straps and a contrasting colour trim at the top. Three tiers of wide flounces with overlocked edges that create movement in the dress. Lined.
